start_text:
🤖 Welcome to the MVČR application status bot! 🤖

🔄 This bot will check your application every {refresh_period} minutes and notify you of any changes.
📌 Start tracking your application with the /subscribe command.
🔍 Want the current status? Use the /status command.
🚀 Need a quick update? Use the /force_refresh command. But remember, you can only use this twice a day! ⏰
❌ Done tracking? Use the /unsubscribe command to stop updates.

***
🕰️ If you've been waiting for your application results for over 60 days, it might be time to take action!
🔗 File a Complaint Here: https://ciziproblem.cz/necinnost_Nin1
***

🐞**Bugs, suggestions:**
📧 Email: olegeech@sytkovo.su
📬 Telegram: @olegeech
subscribe_intro: 👇 Please hit the button below to subscribe to your application status updates.
cizi_problem_promo: Waiting for more than 60 days? 🤔 Maybe it's time to file a complaint 📝.
dialog_app_number: Hey there!👋 Let's get started. Please take a look at your Číslo Jednací, or č. j 🔢 Can you tell me all numbers after "OAM-" but before "/ XX-2023"? Like in OAM-12345-6/TP-2023, it's 12345-6.
dialog_type: Now, please chose your application type📄:
dialog_confirmation: Alright, your application is OAM-{number}-{suffix}/{type}-{year}. Is this correct?🤔
dialog_confirmation_no_suffix: Alright, your application is OAM-{number}/{type}-{year}. Is this correct?🤔
dialog_cancel: No worries! You can always start over by using the /subscribe command.
error_invalid_number: Oops! 🙈 That doesn't seem like a valid application number. Let's try again. Remember, it's all numbers after "OAM-" but before "/ XX-2023"
error_subscribe: 😔 Sorry, something went wrong while trying to subscribe you. Please give it another shot in a bit. If the issue persists, feel free to contact developers.
error_generic: 😓 Oops! Something didn't go quite right. Please try again later. If the issue keeps popping up, feel free to contact developers.
dialog_completion: Fantastic! 🌟 You're all set up. I'll keep you posted with updates related to your application!
